# The `FixBitsMask` Namespace Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Mask of bits used to identify &quot;Fix&quot; variants in MessagePack. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Definition

<CodeBlock>namespace llvm::msgpack::FixBitsMask &#123; ... &#125;</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

Mask of bits used to identify &quot;Fix&quot; variants in MessagePack.

For example, FixStr objects encode their size in the five least significant bits of their first byte, which is identified by the bit pattern &quot;101&quot; in the three most significant bits. So FixBitsMask::String contains 0b11100000.

The corresponding bit pattern to mask for is found in <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/msgpack/fixbits">FixBits</a>.

</DoxygenPage>
